title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is tasked with planting an idea into someone's mind.

title: Interstellar
description: A group of astronauts travels through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.

title: The Dark Knight
column3: a criminal mastermind causing chaos in Gotham City.

title: Titanic
description: A romance blossoms aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic Marine is sent to Pandora and becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The Avengers assemble once more to undo the damage caused by Thanos.

title: The Lion King
description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after the death of his father
column3: only to return and reclaim it.

title: Frozen
description: A princess sets out on a journey with an iceman
column4: and a snowman to find her estranged sister.
